entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow and local blowing snow beginning overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
